title: Tweetdeck is currently down
text:
Tweetdeck, the dashboard management app for Twitter, is down as of Tuesday evening.

Performance issues with the site appeared around 8 p.m. ET.

As of 10:30 p.m. ET, attempting to login to Tweetdeck appears to redirect users directly to Twitter's mobile site.

It's unclear why the site is down and how long it will be unavailable for.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

Tweetdeck, the dashboard management app for Twitter, is down as of Tuesday evening.

According to Outage Report, issues with the site have been reported across North and South America, Europe, and Asia Pacific. Performance issues appear to have began trickling in around 8 p.m. ET.

As of 10:30 p.m. ET, attempting to login to Tweetdeck appears to redirect users directly to Twitter's mobile site.

"We are aware of issues with Tweetdeck and are investigating. Will circle back when we have more to share," a Twitter spokesperson told Business Insider.

Many users expressed frustration with the site being down.

The tool is commonly used by journalists or other content creators in order to monitor news trends and manage content from multiple accounts.
description: Tweetdeck, the dashboard management app for Twitter, is down as of Tuesday evening. It's unclear why the site is unavailable.
